title: Binghuo Zhi Jing
synopsis: The little animals on the pure island united as one, and finally washed away the hateful Uda with pure water. There was peace on the pure island, and everyone lived a happy and happy life. However, Uda did not die. He was washed into the desert by pure water and luckily survived. The frenzied and perverted Uda vowed to avenge his revenge. He took the stolen wand and led his men to kill the island again. In order to resist Uda’s aggression and protect their homes, Jingying Kid led the little animals on Pure Island to give full play to everyone’s ingenuity and use the knowledge learned from the books to defeat Uda’s conspiracy and defend. The pure island. (translated from douban)
